name: Battle Field Creator
description: Battle Field Creator is an unofficial add-on for Battle Isle and also supports the two official add-on disks Data Disk I and The Moon of Chromos. It is a level editor which allows to build new maps (constructing the environment, distributing buildings like the headquarters, setting the ability of the AI opponent, etc.) or edit the official ones. The user interface is menu driven and allows for multitasking and free mouse button configuration.
